name: Eley Contact
lead: ELEY contact is a purpose-engineered subsonic .22LR for semi-automatic platforms, built for shooters who demand extreme accuracy with a softer report and reduced recoil. Perfect for competition and focused training, contact gives you the control to place shots precisely, whilst enjoying faster follow-up shots as well as a more comfortable shooting experience.
description: ELEY contact is a purpose-engineered subsonic .22LR for semi-automatic platforms, built for shooters who demand extreme accuracy with a softer report and reduced recoil. Perfect for competition and focused training, contact gives you the control to place shots precisely, whilst enjoying faster follow-up shots as well as a more comfortable shooting experience.
The lower recoil translates directly into quicker sight-picture recovery, letting competitive semi-automatic shooters re-acquire targets faster and maintain rhythm through strings of fire.
